anya-e0803n9:1: Atha pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā niggahītantanapuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ “bhūtaṁ”iccādikassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṁ vakkhāma –
anya-e0803n9:2_0: Cittaṁ, cittāni. Cittaṁ, cittāni. Cittena, cittehi, cittebhi. Cittassa, cittānaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:2_1: Cittā, cittasmā, cittamhā, cittehi, cittebhi. Cittassa, cittānaṁ. Citte, cittasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n9:2_2: cittamhi, cittesu. Bho citta, bho cittā, bhavanto cittāni. Yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n9:3_1: tathāpi tattha tattha aññesampi tādisānaṁ niggahītantanapuṁsakarūpānaṁ dassanato
anya-e0803n9:3_3: cittāni, cittā. Cittaṁ, cittāni, citte”ti kamo veditabbo. Niggahītantānañhi napuṁsakaliṅgānaṁ
anya-e0803n9:3_4: katthaci okārantapulliṅgānaṁ viya paccattopayogabahuvacanāni bhavanti. Tāni ca pulliṅgena
anya-e0803n9:3_5: vā saliṅgena vā aliṅgena vā saddhiṁ samānādhikaraṇāni hutvā kevalāni vā pāvacane
anya-e0803n9:3_6: sañcaranti. Atra “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Cattāro sammappadhānā. Sabbe mālā upentimaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:3_7: Yassa ete dhanā atthi. Cattāro mahābhūtā. Tīṇindriyā. Dve indriyā. Dasindriyā. Dve
anya-e0803n9:3_8: mahābhūte nissāya dve mahābhūtā, pañca viññāṇā, caturo aṅge adhiṭṭhāya, semi vammikamatthake,
anya-e0803n9:3_9: rūpā saddā rasā gandhā. Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca
anya-e0803n9:3_10: uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti evamādayo anekasatā pāḷippadesā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n9:4_0: Ettha pana “satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīni padāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti na gahetabbāni
anya-e0803n9:4_2: adassanato. “Cattāro”tiādīniyeva pana padāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti gahetabbāni
anya-e0803n9:4_3: niyogā niggahītantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi satipaṭṭhānasaddādīhi saddhiṁ tesaṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa dassanatoti.
anya-e0803n9:5_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ – nanu “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādippayogadassanato
anya-e0803n9:5_1: satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṁ okārantapulliṅgabhāvo labbhati. Evaṁ sante kasmā tumhehi “satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:5_3: kasmā ca ekantato satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṁ niggahītantanapuṁsakaliṅgatā anumatā, nanu
anya-e0803n9:5_4: “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādidassanato “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīsupi
anya-e0803n9:5_5: “satipaṭṭhānasaddādayo liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttā”ti vattabbāti? Na vattabbā, kasmāti
anya-e0803n9:5_6: ce? “Satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsupi satipaṭṭhānacittasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:5_7: liṅgavipallāsavasena anicchitabbato. Tattha hi pulliṅgena dhammasaddena yojetuṁ dhammissaro
anya-e0803n9:5_8: bhagavā dhammāpekkhaṁ katvā “satipaṭṭhāno, citto, cittā”ti ca abhāsi. Kevalā hi satipaṭṭhāna
anya-e0803n9:5_9: cittasaddādayo okārantapulliṅgabhāvena katthacipi yojitā na santi, niggahītantanapuṁsakabhāvena pana yojitā santi.
anya-e0803n9:6_0: Tathā hi “citto gahapatī”ti etthāpi pulliṅgagahapatisaddaṁ apekkhitvā viññāṇe pavattaṁ
anya-e0803n9:6_1: cittanāmaṁ paṇṇattivasena puggale āropetvā puggalavācakaṁ katvā “citto”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:6_2: Yadi pana viññāṇasaṅkhātaṁ cittamadhippetaṁ siyā, “citta”micceva vucceyya. Tasmā
anya-e0803n9:6_3: “citto gahapati, cittā itthī”tiādīsu liṅgavipallāso na icchitabbo sāpekkhattā cittasaddādīnaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:6_4: Yathā ca ettha, evaṁ “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsupi liṅgavipallāso
anya-e0803n9:6_5: na icchitabbo. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīsu pana satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṁ apekkhitabbāni
anya-e0803n9:6_6: padāni na santi, yehi te pulliṅgāni siyuṁ, tasmā “cattāro”tiādīniyeva padāni parivattetvā
anya-e0803n9:6_8: padehi yojetabbāni. Īdisesu ṭhānesu keci aṭṭhakathācariyā nikāralopaṁ icchanti “yā
anya-e0803n9:6_9: pubbe bodhisattānaṁ, pallaṅkavaramābhuje, nimittāni padissantī”ti ettha viya. Adassanañhi
anya-e0803n9:6_10: lopo, tasmā “cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni, cattāri sammappadhānāni, sabbāni mālānī’tiādikā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n9:7_0: Keci pana “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti ettha mālāsaddaṁ itthiliṅganti maññitvā pulliṅgabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n9:7_1: sabbesaddaṁ itthiliṅgavasena parivattetvā “sabbā mālā”ti atthaṁ kathenti. Taṁ kiñcāpi
anya-e0803n9:7_2: yuttataraṁ viya dissati, tathāpi na gahetabbaṁ. Na hi so bhagavā liṅgaṁ naññāsi,
anya-e0803n9:7_3: na ca “sabbā mālā upenti ma”nti dve padāni itthiliṅgāni katvā vattuṁ na sakkhi. Yo
anya-e0803n9:7_4: evaṁ visadisaliṅgāni padāni uccāresi. Jānantoyeva pana bhagavā vattuṁ sakkontoyeva
anya-e0803n9:7_5: ca “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti visadisaliṅgāni padāni uccāresi, tasmā pulliṅgabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n9:7_7: padaṁ viya luttanikārena napuṁsakaliṅgena mālāsaddena yojetvā “sabbāni mālānī”ti
anya-e0803n9:7_8: attho gahetabbo katthaci “yassa ete dhanā atthī”ti ettha viya. Ettha hi yassa etāni
anya-e0803n9:7_9: dhanānīti attho. Idampettha sallakkhitabbaṁ. Mālāsaddo dviliṅgo itthinapuṁsakavasena.
anya-e0803n9:7_10: Tiṭṭhatu tassitthiliṅgattaṁ suviññeyyattā, napuṁsakatte pana tīṇi mālāni. “Mālehi
anya-e0803n9:7_11: ca gandhehi ca bhagavato sarīraṁ pūjentī”tiādayo napuṁsakappayogānipi bahū sandissantīti.
anya-e0803n9:8_0: Yadi pana bho mālasaddo itthinapuṁsakavasena dviliṅgo, “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti
anya-e0803n9:8_1: ettha mālāsaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvaparikappane ko doso atthīti? Attheva itthiliṅgasaddassa
anya-e0803n9:8_3: pana pulliṅgabhūtena sabbanāmikapadena saddhiṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa upalabbhanato.
anya-e0803n9:8_4: Teneva ca “ete dhanā”tiādayo payogā pāvacane bahudhā diṭṭhā. Etthāpi pana vadeyyuṁ
anya-e0803n9:8_6: Na, napuṁsakāniyevetāni. Yadi hi “dhanā”tiādīni pulliṅgāni siyuṁ, katthaci paccattekavacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n9:8_8: abhāvato pana “dhanā indriyā viññāṇā”tiādayo saddā napuṁsakaliṅgāniyeva honti. Ayaṁ
anya-e0803n9:8_9: nayo paccattabahuvacanaṭṭhāneyeva labbhati. Napuṁsakaliṅgāni hi visadākārāni pulliṅgarūpāni
anya-e0803n9:8_10: viya hutvā pulliṅgehipi saddhiṁ caranti, napuṁsakā viya purisavesadhārino purisehīti
anya-e0803n9:9_0: Athāpi te pubbe vuttavacanaṁ puna parivattetvā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ “citto gahapati, cittā
anya-e0803n9:9_1: itthī”tiādīsu cittaṁ etassa atthīti citto, cittaṁ etissā atthīti cittā yathā “saddho,
anya-e0803n9:9_2: saddhā”ti evaṁ assatthīti atthavasena gahetabbato liṅgavipallāso nicchitabbo, “satipaṭṭhāno
anya-e0803n9:9_3: dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīni pana evarūpassa atthassa aggahetabbato
anya-e0803n9:9_4: “satipaṭṭhānaṁ dhammo, cittaṁ dhammo, cittāni dhammā”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena
anya-e0803n9:9_5: “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādi vuttanti liṅgavipallāso icchitabbo”ti?
anya-e0803n9:9_6: Tanna, “citto gahapatī”tiādīsu pana “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo”tiādīsu ca cittasatipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:9_7: gahapati dhammādīnaṁ apekkhanavasena niccaṁ pulliṅgabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0803n9:10_0: Tathā hi ekantanapuṁsakaliṅgopi puññasaddo abhisaṅkhārāpekkhanavasena “puñño abhisaṅkhāro”ti
anya-e0803n9:10_1: pulliṅgo jāto, tathā ekantanapuṁsakaliṅgāpi paduma maṅgalasaddādayo aññassatthassāpekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n9:10_2: “padumo bhagavā, padumā devī, maṅgalo bhagavā, maṅgalā itthī”ti ca pumitthiliṅgā
anya-e0803n9:10_3: jātā. Ekantapulliṅgāpi hatthivisesavācakā kālāvaka gaṅgeyyasaddādayo kulāpekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n9:10_4: “kālāvakañca gaṅgeyya”ntiādinā napuṁsakaliṅgā jātā. Tadapekkhanavasena hi aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0803n9:10_5: “kālāvako ca gaṅgeyyo”tiādi pulliṅganiddeso dissati. Evaṁ taṁtadatthānamapekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n9:10_6: taṁtaṁpakatiliṅgaṁ nāsetvā aparaṁ liṅgaṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā niddeso dissati, na ca tāni
anya-e0803n9:10_7: sabbānipi liṅgāni taddhitavasena aññaliṅgāni jātāni, atha kho gahapatidhammādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:10_8: apekkhanavaseneva aññaliṅgāni jātāni, tasmā “petāni bhoti puttāni, khādamānā tuvaṁ
anya-e0803n9:10_9: pure. Siviputtāni cavhaya. Evaṁ dhammāni sutvāna, vippasīdanti paṇḍitā”tiādīsuyeva
anya-e0803n9:10_10: liṅgavipallāso icchitabbo anaññāpekkhakattā vuttadhammasaddādīnaṁ, na pana “citto
anya-e0803n9:10_11: gahapati, cittā itthī, satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsu cittasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:10_12: vipallāso icchitabbo gahapati dhammādīnaṁ apekkhakattā tesanti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n9:10_13: idañca ekaccānaṁ sammohaṭṭhānaṁ, tasmā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā ayaṁ nīti saddhāsampannehi
anya-e0803n9:11_0: Badaratitthavihāravāsī ācariyadhammapālo pana “aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā akkharā aparimāṇā
anya-e0803n9:11_1: byañjanāti pāḷippadese ‘padā akkharā byañjanā’ti liṅgavipallāso katoti daṭṭhabba”nti
anya-e0803n9:11_2: āha. Etthāpi mayaṁ “padā”ti idaṁ “indriyā rūpā”tiādīni viya napuṁsakaliṅgamevāti
anya-e0803n9:11_3: vadāma okārantavasena paṭhamekavacanantabhāvābhāvato, itaradvayaṁ pana napuṁsakaliṅgantipi
anya-e0803n9:11_5: Tathā hi “puttāni latāni pabbatāni dhammānī”tiādīnaṁyeva liṅgavipallāsāni icchitabbāni
anya-e0803n9:11_7: paṭhamekavacanantatādassanato. “Jarādhammaṁ mā jīrī”ti idaṁ pana aññapadatthavasena
anya-e0803n9:12_0: Bhūtaṁ, bhūtāni, bhūtā. Bhūtaṁ, bhūtāni, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa,
anya-e0803n9:12_1: bhūtānaṁ. Bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūte,
anya-e0803n9:12_2: bhūtasmiṁ, bhūtamhi, bhūtesu. Bho bhūta, bhavanto bhūtāni, bhavanto bhūtā. Evaṁ cittanayena
anya-e0803n9:13: Iminā nayena “mahābhūtaṁ bhavittaṁ bhūnaṁ bhavana”miccādīnaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ niggahītantapadānaṁ aññesañca “vatta”miccādīnaṁ niggahītantapadānaṁ nāmikapadamālā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n9:14: Vattaṁ rūpaṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ, dukkhaṁ pupphaṁ jhānaṁ ñāṇaṁ;
anya-e0803n9:15: Dānaṁ sīlaṁ puññaṁ pāpaṁ, vajjaṁ saccaṁ yānaṁ chattaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:16: Sakaṭaṁ kanakaṁ tagaraṁ nagaraṁ, taraṇaṁ caraṇaṁ dharaṇaṁ maraṇaṁ;
anya-e0803n9:17: Nayanaṁ vadanaṁ karaṇaṁ lavanaṁ, vasanaṁ pavanaṁ bhavanaṁ gaganaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:18: Amataṁ puḷinaṁ mālaṁ, āsanaṁ savanaṁ mukhaṁ;
anya-e0803n9:19: Padumaṁ uppalaṁ vassaṁ, locanaṁ sādhanaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:20: Tāṇaṁ mūlaṁ dhanaṁ kūlaṁ, maṅgalaṁ naḷinaṁ phalaṁ;
anya-e0803n9:21: Hiraññaṁ ambujaṁ dhaññaṁ, jālaṁ liṅgaṁ padaṁ jalaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:22: Aṅgaṁ paṇṇaṁ susānaṁ saṁ, āvudhaṁ hadayaṁ vanaṁ;
anya-e0803n9:23: Sopānaṁ cīvaraṁ pāṇaṁ, alātaṁ indriyaṁ kulaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:24: Lohaṁ kaṇaṁ balaṁ pīṭhaṁ, aṇḍaṁ ārammaṇaṁ puraṁ;
anya-e0803n9:26: Imāni cittasaddena sabbathāpi sadisāni, imāni pana visadisāni. Seyyathidaṁ –
anya-e0803n9:30: Camme, cammasmiṁ, cammamhi, cammani, vesme, vesmasmiṁ, vesmamhi, vesmani, ghamme, ghammasmiṁ, ghammamhi, ghammani. Evaṁ aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n9:31_0: Kammaṁ, kammāni, kammā. Kammaṁ, kammāni, kamme. Kammena, kammunā, kammanā, kammehi,
anya-e0803n9:31_1: kammebhi. Kammassa, kammuno, kammānaṁ. Kammasmā, kammamhā, kammunā, kammehi, kammebhi.
anya-e0803n9:31_2: Kammassa, kammuno, kammānaṁ. Kamme, kammasmiṁ, kammamhi, kammani, kammesu. Bho kamma,
anya-e0803n9:32: Thāmasaddassa pana tatiyekavacanaṭṭhānādīsu “thāmena, thāmunā, thāmassa, thāmuno”ti ca, “thāmā, thāmasmā, thāmamhā, thāmunā”ti ca yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:33: Vantu mantu imantupaccayavataṁ pana niggahītantasaddānaṁ “guṇavaṁ cittaṁ, rucimaṁ pupphaṁ, pāpimaṁ kulaṁ” iccādipayogavasena –
anya-e0803n9:34_0: Guṇavaṁ, guṇavantāni, guṇavantā, guṇavanti. Guṇavantaṁ, guṇavantāni, guṇavante guṇavanti.
anya-e0803n9:34_1: Guṇavatā, guṇavantena, guṇavantehi, guṇavantebhi. Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṁ,
anya-e0803n9:34_2: guṇavantānaṁ. Guṇavatā, guṇavantā, guṇavantasmā, guṇavantamhā, guṇavantehi, guṇavantebhi.
anya-e0803n9:34_3: Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṁ, guṇavantānaṁ. Guṇavati, guṇavante, guṇavantasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n9:34_4: guṇavantamhi, guṇavantesu. Bho guṇava, bhavanto guṇavantāni, guṇavanti.
anya-e0803n9:35_1: iccādinā ca yojetabbaṁ. Apicettha “guṇavaṁ balavaṁ yasavaṁ satimaṁ gatimaṁ”iccādinā
anya-e0803n9:37_0: Karontaṁ, karontāni, karontā, karonti. Karontaṁ, karontāni, karonte, karonti. Karotā,
anya-e0803n9:37_1: karontena, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karato, karontassa, karontānaṁ, karotaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:37_2: Karotā, karontā, karontasmā, karontamhā, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karato, karontassa,
anya-e0803n9:37_3: karontānaṁ, karotaṁ. Karoti, karonte, karontasmiṁ, karontamhi, karontesu. Bho karonta,
anya-e0803n9:38: Gacchantasaddassa tu “gacchantaṁ cittaṁ, gacchantaṁ kula”nti payogavasena –
anya-e0803n9:39_0: Gacchantaṁ, gacchantāni, gacchantā. Gacchantaṁ, gacchantāni, gacchante. Gacchatā,
anya-e0803n9:39_1: gacchantena, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi. Gacchato, gacchantassa, gacchantānaṁ, gacchataṁ.
anya-e0803n9:39_2: Gacchatā, gacchantā, gacchantasmā, gacchantamhā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi. Gacchato,
anya-e0803n9:39_3: gacchantassa, gacchantānaṁ, gacchataṁ. Gacchati, gacchante, gacchantasmiṁ, gacchantamhi,
anya-e0803n9:39_4: gacchantesu. Bho gacchaṁ, bho gacchantā, bhavanto gacchantāni, gacchantāti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n9:40: Evaṁ “carantaṁ dadantaṁ tiṭṭhantaṁ cintayanta”ntiādīsupi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n9:41_0: Mahantasaddassa pana koci bhedo, tathā hi “bārāṇasirajjaṁ nāma mahā”ti evaṁ “mahā”iti
anya-e0803n9:41_1: napuṁsakapayogadassanato “mahantaṁ, mahā, mahantāni, mahantā. Mahantaṁ, mahantāni,
anya-e0803n9:41_2: mahante. Mahatā”ti kamo veditabbo. Sabbānetāni cittasaddena visadisāni.
anya-e0803n9:45: Idāni tassīlatthassa katarassassa atthavibhāvi iccetassa saddassa nāmikapadamālaṁ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā –
anya-e0803n9:46_0: Aṭṭhi, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni. Aṭṭhiṁ, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni. Aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Aṭṭhissa,
anya-e0803n9:46_1: aṭṭhino, aṭṭhīnaṁ. Aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Aṭṭhissa, aṭṭhino, aṭṭhīnaṁ. Aṭṭhismiṁ,
anya-e0803n9:46_2: aṭṭhimhi, aṭṭhīsu. Bho aṭṭhi, bhavanto aṭṭhī, bhavanto aṭṭhīni. Yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n9:47_0: Kiñcāpettha nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne “aṭṭhismā, aṭṭhimhā”ti padāni anāgatāni, tathāpi
anya-e0803n9:47_1: tattha tattha taṁsadisappayogadassanā gahetabbāni. Yathā pana aṭṭhisaddassa, evaṁ
anya-e0803n9:47_2: “satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi”iccādīnampi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n9:48_0: Atthavibhāvi, atthavibhāvī, atthavibhāvīni. Atthavibhāviṁ, atthavibhāvī, atthavibhāvīni.
anya-e0803n9:48_4: atthavibhāvimhi, atthavibhāvīsu. Bho atthavibhāvi, bhavanto atthavibhāvī, bhavanto atthavibhāvīni.
anya-e0803n9:49_0: Evaṁ “dhammavibhāvi, cittānuparivatti, sukhakāri”iccādīnipi. Tattha aṭṭhi satthiādīni
anya-e0803n9:49_1: padhānaliṅgāni anaññāpekkhakattā, atthavibhāvi dhammavibhāviādīni appadhānaliṅgāni aññāpekkhakattā.
anya-e0803n9:52: Idāni katarassassa gotrabhu iccetassa saddassa nāmikapadamālaṁ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā –
anya-e0803n9:53_0: Āyu, āyū, āyūni. Āyuṁ, āyū, āyūni. Āyunā, āyūhi, āyūbhi. Āyussa, āyuno, āyūnaṁ. Āyunā,
anya-e0803n9:53_1: āyūhi, āyūbhi. Āyussa, āyuno, āyūnaṁ. Āyusmiṁ, āyumhi, āyūsu. Bho āyu, bhavanto āyū,
anya-e0803n9:54_0: Kiñcāpettha nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne “āyusmā, āyumhā”ti padāni anāgatāni, tathāpi tattha
anya-e0803n9:54_1: tattha taṁsadisappayogadassanato gahetabbāni. Ettha ca āyusaddo puṁnapuṁsakaliṅgo
anya-e0803n9:54_2: daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca tassa dviliṅgatā dissati. “Punarāyu ca
anya-e0803n9:54_3: me laddho, evaṁ jānāhi mārisa. Āyu cassā parikkhīṇo ahosī”tiādīsu hi āyusaddo pulliṅgo,
anya-e0803n9:54_4: tabbasena “āyu, āyū, āyavo”tiādinā bhikkhunayena yathāsambhavaṁ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n9:54_5: “Aggaṁ āyu ca vaṇṇo ca. Kittakaṁ panassa āyū”tiādīsu pana napuṁsakaliṅgo, tabbasena
anya-e0803n9:55_0: Gotrabhu, gotrabhū, gotrabhūni. Gotrabhuṁ, gotrabhū, gotrabhūni. Gotrabhunā, gotrabhūhi,
anya-e0803n9:55_1: gotrabhūbhi. Gotrabhussa, gotrabhuno, gotrabhūnaṁ. Gotrabhunā, gotrabhusmā, gotrabhumhā,
anya-e0803n9:55_2: gotrabhūhi, gotrabhūbhi. Gotrabhussa, gotrabhuno, gotrabhūnaṁ. Gotrabhusmiṁ, gotrabhumhi,
anya-e0803n9:55_3: gotrabhūsu. Bho gotrabhu, bhavanto gotrabhū, bhavanto gotrabhūni. Bho gotrabhū, bho
anya-e0803n9:55_4: gotrabhūni, evaṁ bahuvacanaṁ vā. Ayamamhākaṁ mataṁ, evaṁ “cittasahabhu”iccādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n9:55_5: bhūdhātumayānaṁ ukārantasaddānaṁ aññesampi taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n9:55_6: Puggalavācako pana ūkāranto gotrabhūsaddo pulliṅgapariyāpannattā sabbaññūnaye paviṭṭho.
anya-e0803n9:55_7: Tatraññe saddā nāma “cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu siṅgu hiṅgu cittagu”iccādayo.
anya-e0803n9:59_0: Evaṁ niggahītanta ikāranta ukārantavasena tividhāni napuṁsakaliṅgāni niravasesato
anya-e0803n9:59_1: gahitāneva honti. Tesu kesañci niggahītantānaṁ kvaci paccattekavacanassa bahuvacanassa
anya-e0803n9:59_2: ekārādesavasena bhedo dissati. Seyyathidaṁ? “Sukhe dukkhe. Ekūnapaññāsa ājīvakasate
anya-e0803n9:59_3: ekūnapaññāsa paribbājakasate”iccevamādi. Nanu bho evaṁvidhānaṁ rūpānaṁ pāḷiyaṁ dassanato
anya-e0803n9:59_4: “ekārantampi napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ atthī”ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṁ niggahītantogadharūpavisesattā
anya-e0803n9:59_5: tesaṁ rūpānaṁ. Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṁ ekārantaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0803n9:64: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
